text: Llucmajor (; ) is the largest city of the Balearic Island Majorca. ==References== ==Other websites== * Llucmajor (in Catalan) * Llucmajor English tourist guide * Informació de l'Institut Balear d'Estadística - data sheet (PDF file in Catalan) Category:Cities in the Balearic Islands Category:Municipalities in the Balearic Islands
title: Llucmajor
